verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a cry inmy heart
For your glory to fall
For your Presence to fill up senses

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is a yearning again
A thirst for discipline
A hunger for things that are deeper

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Could You take me beyond
Could You carry me through
If I open my heart
Could I go there with you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
For what do i have
If i dont have you Jesus
What in this life
Could mean any more
You are my rock
You are my glory
You are the lifter of my head

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Could You take me beyond
Could You Carry me through
If i open my heart
Could i go there with you
For I've been here before
Yet i know there's still more
Olord i need to know You
